content: make the perfect crochet rainbow baby blanket with the surprisingly easy rainbow isles baby blanket crochet pattern my favorite thing about this design is not only the rainbow stripes because who doesn t love a gorgeous rainbow but is actually the texture it s equally beautiful on both sides this pattern has been tested **sizes** one size - 30 inches long x 28 inches wide baby blanket size customization instructions are included in the pattern **skill level** easy/intermediate - advanced beginner **recommended yarn** 1 skein each of lion brand truboo yarn in the colors -hot pink -coral -tangerine -marigold -yellow -celery -seafoam -thistle -mauve or 1 085 yards size 3 yarn in color s of your choice **hook** 4 mm crochet hook **notions** yarn needles scissors **gauge** 9 mixed cluster sts x 15 row = 4 inches x 4 inches **finished dimensions** 30 inches long x 28 inches wide **terms to know** chain single_crochet double_crochet mixed cluster stitch mixed cluster stitch instructions and video tutorial link are provided in pattern
